text: Roh [-i sarzanisu mucozot] tanho ʙaroi kasone [kusoda] ast, ki ʙo onki tavongar [va imkoni cihod dorand], az tu icozat mexohand [ki dar cihod sirkat nakunand]. Onon ʙa in rizoijat dodand, ki ʙo xonanisinon ʙosand va Alloh taolo ʙar dilhojason muhr [-i nifoq] zadaast, pas, [xajru salohi xesro] darnamejoʙand
